Version 1.2.0 ppl post

A relatively small release in terms of new functionality, 1.2.0 simply adds the ppl post command. This command was always in the pipeline, but thanks anways to nicky0 on Hacker News for prompting me to prioritise it slightly.

  • Added ppl post command
